original_text: Now when he had finished measuring the interior of the temple area, he led me out by the gate that faced east, and measured the temple area all around.
korean_text: 그가 안에 있는 성전 측량하기를 마친 후에 나를 데리고 동쪽을 향한 문의 길로 나가서 사방 담을 측량하는데

sentences.original_text: Now when he had finished measuring the interior of the temple area,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 성전 안뜰의 측량을 마쳤을 때,

sentences.original_text: he led me out by the gate that faced east,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 동쪽을 향한 문으로 나를 이끌어내고,

sentences.original_text: and measured the temple area all around.
